Params: {2: 'I was looking for you.', 3: '6', 4: "You've been watching all this time, haven't you?", 5: '7'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'I was just making observations. I fought my hardest in battle, too.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "That's what made me find the courage.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Commandant, I'm not like other Constructs. I'll stop at nothing to achieve my goal.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'I want to become strong... stronger than everyone. Only then will I have the right to replace Lucia and the others. Right?', 4: '1'}
{2: "But I can't just watch you.", 3: '13', 4: 'Karenina, where are you going with...', 5: '16'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "So... Even if I'm strong enough, that won't be enough?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "I believe a Construct's value is to show one's strength in the fight against the Corrupted.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Only now am I fit to do so.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "My recklessness from before and my level-headedness nowâ€”That's all still me...", 4: '1'}
